DOC.brief_summary: The corneal collagen cross-linking treatment use increase success treat corneal dystrophy `` keratoconus . '' Recent advance allow different technique perform cross-linking treatment . This study investigate effect corneal cross-linking use different surgical technique .
DOC.criteria: Age 1070 , willing participate , diagnosis corneal ectasia disorder Unwilling unable participate trial
